attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government wants to encourage the public in trading in their old cars for new thus helping the economy and the environment.
however it would be only be fair that those people who do not want to own a car should be encouraged and rewarded with free bus and train passes.this would in turn benefit the environment by encouraging more people to switch to public transport,it would also help prevent roads from being clogged with more drivers and would benefit low paid families who cannot afford both their own car and use of public transport.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
